trans-unit.source: Contains the specific settings for an instance of a custom peer resolver service.
This type defines the basic settings for a custom peer resolver service, including the endpoint address of the peer hosting the service and any specific binding settings.
These settings are typically provided to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverSettings.Custom%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the endpoint address of the peer node hosting the custom peer resolver service.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that contains the endpoint address of the peer node running the custom peer resolver service.
Gets or sets the channel binding used by the custom peer resolver service.
This binding element provides the specification for building a channel factory on the client and a channel listener on the service.
This channel factory is used to produce channels for the custom peer resolver service.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> that contains the binding settings for this service.
Gets whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings.Binding"></xref> property is set.
True if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings.Binding"></xref> property is set; false if it is not.
Gets or sets the custom peer resolver instance for this service.
